strong: King Industries is actively looking to hire a Junior Software Developer responsible for developing business applications that support various operational needs. Ideal candidates should have a Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree in computer science/engineering or related technical field, as well as experience using SQL server or other RDBMS systems for development.

li: Methodical developer who is focused and practices due care with a strong attention to detail.
li.1: A go-getter who can balance their need for flawless execution with the need to meet project deadlines.
li.2: Team player who enjoys working with others to design and implement robust solutions for challenging real-world problems.
li.3: Passionate problem solver who listens carefully and enjoys sharing their ideas with others.
li.4: Critical thinker who thrives when working with a variety of programming languages across multiple systems.
li.5: Ingenious designer whose understanding of data engineering fundamentals enables them to conceptualize manual processes, generate logical workflows and create systems to reduce human dependency.
li.6: A supporter of and advocate for diversity, equity, and inclusion

li: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree in technical field, computer science/engineering.
li.1: Exposure to MS SQL Server, BI Platforms like MS Power BI, Nectari, Tableau, Crystal Reports.
li.2: Knowledge of web development platforms like ASP.NET, SharePoint, MVC, Blazor, etc.
li.3: Understanding of object-oriented programming =E2=80=93 classes, methods, inheritance, method overriding, etc.
li.4: Experience developing web-based business-oriented applications. Knowledge of supply chain operations a huge plus.
li.5: Experience using SQL Server or other RDBMS systems for development.
li.6: Knowledge of designing/building/deploying custom web applications.
li.7: Understanding of Microsoft environments, Power Shell, and AD =E2=80=93 must be able to navigate Windows operating systems.
li.8: Excellent written and verbal communication with both technical and non-technical audiences.
li.9: Must have a good balance of resourcefulness - If you do not know how to do something new, figure it out, but if you are stuck, do not spend too much time on it before asking for help.

li: Develop web-based applications in a team setting
li.1: Collaborate with users, data consumers and BI analysts to understand data models and application workflow requirements.
li.2: Work with senior developers to complete existing projects as well as independent projects
li.3: Participate in planning and brainstorming sessions
li.4: Design and implement production quality solutions
